alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hardin County through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Savannah, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Savannah, Pickwick Landing State Park, Olive Hill, Pickwick Dam, Crump, Counce, Lowryville, Hamburg, Phillips, Bruton Branch, Center Star, Maddox, Swift, Walkertown, Olivehill, Bucktown and Cerro Gordo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for west Tennessee.
